charinfo.name: Deidara (S)
charinfo.description: A former ninja of the Earth Village and now a junior Akatsuki member, Deidara(s) is able to fuse clay and chakra to create devastating explosives.

abilities.name: Clay Mold
abilities.description: First use changes Small Explosives into Medium. Second use changes Medium Explosives into Large. Third use changes Large Explosives into Small. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Explosives - Small, Medium, Large
abilities.description: 1) Small Explosives deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy and ignores invulnerability.2) Medium Explosives deal 25 damage to one enemy.3) Large Explosives deal 20 damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Art is a Bang
abilities.description: Deidara makes his last stand, creating a giant explosion he deals 35 damage to all enemies when he dies. This skill may only be used once and is invisible until he dies. This skill becomes C4 when used.

abilities.name: Clay Clone
abilities.description: This skill makes Deidara (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
